Address.label: Address
Address.value: 76 SOUTH MAIN STREET, AKRON, Ohio, 44308, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: FirstEnergy is one of the largest investor-owned utilities in the United States with 10 regulated distribution companies across six mid-Atlantic and Midwestern states. FirstEnergy also owns and operates one of the nation's largest electric transmission systems with 24,000 miles of lines.
